languages.text: "Гвардейцы! Я прош{mf|ел|ла} путь от рядового до генерал-лейтенанта, и я говорю вам: этот безумец не имеет права вести вас. Даже такие салаги должны увидеть разницу между истинным командиром и самозванцем!"

"Guardsmen! I have walked the road from private to lieutenant general, and I say to you now: this madman has no right to lead you. Even fresh recruits like you should be able to tell the difference between a true commander and an impostor!"
languages.original_text: "Гвардейцы! Я прош{mf|ел|ла} путь от рядового до генерал-лейтенанта, и я говорю вам: этот безумец не имеет права вести вас. Даже такие салаги должны увидеть разницу между истинным командиром и самозванцем!"

traits.locale_text: "Guardsmen! I have walked the road from private to lieutenant general, and I say to you now: this madman has no right to lead you. Even fresh recruits like you should be able to tell the difference between a true commander and an impostor!"

"Guardsmen! I have walked the road from a private to a lieutenant general, and I say to you now: this madman has no right to lead you. Even fresh recruits like you should be able to tell the difference between a true commander and an impostor!"

"Guardsmen! I have walked the road from private to lieutenant general, and I say to you now: this madman has no right to lead you. Even fresh recruits like you should be able to tell the difference between a true commander and an impostor!"

"Guardsmen! I have walked the road from private to lieutenant general, and I say to you now: this madman has no right to lead you. Even fresh recruits like you should be able to tell the difference between a true commander and an impostor!"

"Guardsmen! I have walked the road from private to lieutenant general, and I say to you now: this madman has no right to lead you. Even fresh recruits like you should be able to tell the difference between a true commander and an impostor!"

"Guardsmen! I have walked the road from private to lieutenant general, and I say to you now: this madman has no right to lead you. Even fresh recruits like you should be able to tell the difference between a true commander and an impostor!"

languages.text: "Soldaten! Ich habe den Weg vom Gefreiten bis zum Lieutenant-General beschritten und sage Euch jetzt, dass dieser Wahnsinnige kein Recht hat, Euch anzuführen. Selbst frische Rekruten wie Ihr sollten den Unterscheid zwischen einem echten Commander und einem Hochstapler erkennen!"
languages.original_text: "Guardsmen! I have walked the road from private to lieutenant general, and I say to you now: this madman has no right to lead you. Even fresh recruits like you should be able to tell the difference between a true commander and an impostor!"

traits.locale_text: "Soldaten! Ich habe den Weg vom Gefreiten bis zum Lieutenant-General beschritten und sage Euch jetzt, dass dieser Wahnsinnige kein Recht hat, Euch anzuführen. Selbst frische Rekruten wie Ihr sollten den Unterscheid zwischen einem echten Commander und einem Hochstapler erkennen!"

languages.text: « Gardes ! J'ai gravi les échelons jusqu'au grade de {mf|lieutenant-général|lieutenante-générale}. Écoutez-moi bien : ce fou n'a aucunement le droit de vous mener. Même la bleusaille comme vous doit savoir différencier un vrai commandant d'un imposteur ! »
languages.original_text: "Guardsmen! I have walked the road from private to lieutenant general, and I say to you now: this madman has no right to lead you. Even fresh recruits like you should be able to tell the difference between a true commander and an impostor!"

traits.locale_text: « Gardes ! J'ai gravi les échelons jusqu'au grade de {mf|lieutenant-général|lieutenante-générale}. Écoutez-moi bien : ce fou n'a aucunement le droit de vous mener. Même la bleusaille comme vous doit savoir différencier un vrai commandant d'un imposteur ! »

languages.text: “帝国卫队士兵，给我听好！我入伍的时候是个列兵，这么多年一路走到了中将的位置。我要告诉你们，这个疯子无权当你们的指挥官。哪怕是你们这样的新兵蛋子，应该也能看得出谁是真正的指挥官，谁是冒牌货！”
languages.original_text: "Guardsmen! I have walked the road from private to lieutenant general, and I say to you now: this madman has no right to lead you. Even fresh recruits like you should be able to tell the difference between a true commander and an impostor!"

traits.locale_text: “帝国卫队士兵，给我听好！我入伍的时候是个列兵，这么多年一路走到了中将的位置。我要告诉你们，这个疯子无权当你们的指挥官。哪怕是你们这样的新兵蛋子，应该也能看得出谁是真正的指挥官，谁是冒牌货！”

languages.text: «¡Guardias! Ascendí luchando desde soldado raso a teniente general, y os digo que este lunático no tiene derecho a dirigirlos. ¡Hasta reclutas frescos como ustedes deben poder distinguir un verdadero comandante de un impostor!».
languages.original_text: "Guardsmen! I have walked the road from private to lieutenant general, and I say to you now: this madman has no right to lead you. Even fresh recruits like you should be able to tell the difference between a true commander and an impostor!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Guardias! Ascendí luchando desde soldado raso a teniente general, y os digo que este lunático no tiene derecho a dirigirlos. ¡Hasta reclutas frescos como ustedes deben poder distinguir un verdadero comandante de un impostor!».

languages.text: 「ガーズマン諸君！{mf|俺|私}は一兵卒から中尉まで昇り詰めた人間だ。だから、よく聞け、この狂人には諸君を率いる権利などない。諸君のような新兵でも、真の司令官と偽者の違いくらい分かるはずだ！」
languages.original_text: "Guardsmen! I have walked the road from private to lieutenant general, and I say to you now: this madman has no right to lead you. Even fresh recruits like you should be able to tell the difference between a true commander and an impostor!"

traits.locale_text: 「ガーズマン諸君！{mf|俺|私}は一兵卒から中尉まで昇り詰めた人間だ。だから、よく聞け、この狂人には諸君を率いる権利などない。諸君のような新兵でも、真の司令官と偽者の違いくらい分かるはずだ！」

languages.text: "Muhafızlar! Korgeneral olana dek çok şey gördüm geçirdim. Diyeceklerime kulak verin: Bu zırdelinin sizi yönetmeye hakkı yok. Sizin gibi yeni yetmelerin bile gerçek bir komutanla bir sahtekâr arasındaki farkı anlayabiliyor olması gerek!"
languages.original_text: "Guardsmen! I have walked the road from private to lieutenant general, and I say to you now: this madman has no right to lead you. Even fresh recruits like you should be able to tell the difference between a true commander and an impostor!"

traits.locale_text: "Muhafızlar! Korgeneral olana dek çok şey gördüm geçirdim. Diyeceklerime kulak verin: Bu zırdelinin sizi yönetmeye hakkı yok. Sizin gibi yeni yetmelerin bile gerçek bir komutanla bir sahtekâr arasındaki farkı anlayabiliyor olması gerek!"
